I found one. 

In the bathroom.

iPhone development makes me so so happy.
So my infographic has gotten slightly less than 250,000 views in less than 2 days, and, frankly, I don't feel any cooler.
Quick nap and then back to iPhone development... getting some code down. A couple mental breakthroughs.
